QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Flamebinders
QuestData.Description: Even as we attempt to fight off the Horde, the Dragonflayer tribe musters in their village of Voldrune, near the coast to the south.$B$BThe most powerful warriors in the village are granted flame-imbued talismans that give them the ability to control powerful, savage proto-drakes. If we can gain control of one of these drakes, perhaps we can use it to neutralize the threat posed by Voldrune.$B$BThe Dragonflayer flamebinders create the talismans and imbue them with power. Kill them and take the talismans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 3 Flame-Imbued Talismans to Woodsman Drake at Amberpine Lodge.
QuestData.RewardText: With the talismans in hand, the drake will have no choice but to obey you. I can't wait to see the look on the thane's face when he realizes you've commandeered his proto-drake.
